mapper.select: SELECT customer_id, password, name, birth_date, gender, phone, email, address, reg_date FROM shez_customers ORDER BY reg_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shez_customers (customer_id, password, name, birth_date, gender, phone, email, address) VALUES (#{customerId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address})
mapper.update: UPDATE shez_customers SET name = #{name}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, gender = #{gender}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, address = #{address} WHERE customer_id = #{customerId}
